summary: This is an email chain regarding a Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) case, New York Times v. Bureau of Prisons (BOP), case number 20-cv-833, concerning Jeffrey Epstein. The email appears to be internal DOJ correspondence forwarding or discussing the FOIA request.

events.title: FOIA Lawsuit Filed
events.description: The New York Times files a Freedom of Information Act lawsuit against the Bureau of Prisons, case number 20-cv-833, seeking records related to Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated January 8, 2021, concerning a FOIA case related to Jeffrey Epstein.
The referenced case is New York Times v. Bureau of Prisons, case number 20-cv-833.
The email appears to be internal DOJ correspondence, forwarded as part of document production.
The subject indicates the document is part of a FOIA release, specifically from the Epstein FOIA case.
